system.structuralIntegrity: 20 Add. Crew, 750 Tonnes Processed Ore, Hanger for 1 Massive/2 Hulking Vehicle
system.crew:
Heavy Mining Drill (Front, Melee, 5d10 R, Pen 15, Tearing, Unwieldy)
Mining Laser (Front, 100m, Heavy, S/-/-, 4d10+5 E, Pen 10, Inaccurate, Overheats, Recharge)
Digging Arms (Front, Melee, 2d10+10, Pen 4, Unwieldy)
system.passengers: Has enough Air, Fuel, Water, and Provisions to last a full crew complement 1 Month in hostile environments. Weapons may be used by any of the crew, but have -30 when attacking anything of Average Size or Smaller. When receiving Critical Hits not as a result of Righteous Fury, halve the result, rounding up.
